SELECT b.supervisorId,b.supervisorNum,b.deptName,b.deptId,b.`name`,b.province,b.city,b.county,b.area,b.totalPrice,(@i :=@i + 1) AS deptRank FROM( SELECT ss.supervisorId,ss.supervisorNum,ss.deptId,ss.`name`,cd.deptName,ss.province,ss.city,ss.county,ss.area,IFNULL(tt.allPrice, 0) AS totalPrice FROM sys_supervisor ss INNER JOIN c_dept cd ON ss.deptId = cd.deptId LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(ta.orderPrice) AS allPrice,ts.supervisorId FROM t_order ta LEFT JOIN t_store ts ON ta.userId = ts.userId WHERE ta.`status` = 1 AND ta.orderStatus != '-1' GROUP BY ts.supervisorId ) tt ON ss.supervisorNum = tt.supervisorId WHERE 1=1
AND ss.deptId=(SELECT deptId FROM sys_user WHERE userId =#{relationMap.userId})
AND ss.city LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{relationMap.city}),'%')
AND ss.province LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{relationMap.province}),'%')
AND ss.county=#{relationMap.county}
AND ss.deptId=#{relationMap.deptId}
ORDER BY totalPrice DESC ) AS b, (SELECT @i := 0) AS it

SELECT c.deptName,c.deptRank,c.area,c.name,c.totalPrice,c.supervisorId FROM( SELECT b.supervisorId,b.totalPrice,b.deptName,b.name,b.area,b.city,b.province,b.county,(@j:=@j+1) AS deptRank FROM ( SELECT ts.supervisorId, SUM(t.orderPrice) AS totalPrice, ss.city,ss.province,ss.county,cd.deptName,ss.name,ss.area FROM t_order t LEFT JOIN t_store ts ON t.userId = ts.userId LEFT JOIN sys_supervisor ss ON ss.supervisorNum = ts.supervisorId LEFT JOIN c_dept cd ON cd.deptId=ss.deptId WHERE t.`status` = 1 AND t.orderStatus != '-1' AND ts.`status` = 1 AND ss.deptId =#{deptId} GROUP BY ts.supervisorId, ss.city,ss.province,ss.county,cd.deptName,ss.name,ss.area ORDER BY totalPrice DESC ) AS b,(select @j:=0) as it ) as c WHERE c.supervisorId=#{supervisorId}
